text: @mrguy22494Â ...Rondo of Blood IS Dracula X. What you're listening to here is the version from Dracula XX, the Super Famicom sequel to Rondo of Blood. It isn't a port, like the crappy Western localization would lead you to believe.Â

author: Periculum Magnum

text:
Engine kicks ass anyway)It's CDmdl2,after all.
P.S I admire Genesis music more than Snes,because Snes has that Sony sound chip which could use real music samples-that's why it sounded like real instruments. Sega Genesis has that crappy 8-bit yamaha sound sythesizer which can produce only noise!Still the programmers tried to use it as best as they could. And there are some masterpieces for Sega.
